dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1865 IS: Tanning Tax Repeal Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul (for himself, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Cramer, and Mr. Budd) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on indoor tanning services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tanning Tax Repeal Act of 2025.

section.header: Repeal of excise tax on indoor tanning services

subsection.text: Subtitle D of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking chapter 49 and by striking the item relating to such chapter in the table of chapters of such subtitle.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to services performed after the date of the enactment of this Act.
